Title: üñº Defense Minister Yoav Gallant says Israel is closely tracking ...
Description: Defense Minister Yoav Gallant says Israel is closely tracking its enemies, as the country expects an attack from Iran and its Lebanese proxy Hezbollah.-I am aware of the tensions and the great burden placed on the citizens of Israel. We are following what is happening, in Beirut, in Tehran, and in other places,- Gallant says during a visit to an IDF intelligence base in northern Israel.-We are engaged both in removing the threats and preparing all possibilities, in order to be able to attack wherever we decide,- he adds, according to remarks provided by his office.

Title: üé¨ The IDF releases footage of a recent airstrike on a group of g...
Description: The IDF releases footage of a recent airstrike on a group of gunmen in southern Gaza's Rafah.The cell had been spotted by troops of the Givati Brigade using a drone, the military says.

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏è Al Arabiya reports that two Hezbollah members were killed in t...
Description: Mannie's War Room: Lebanese media report an Israeli drone strike on a vehicle between the southern Lebanon towns of Beit Yahoun and Baraachit. No further details are immediately available. Al Arabiya reports that two Hezbollah members were killed in the IDF strike in southern Lebanon.

Title: According to the IDF, one rocket fired from the Gaza Strip landed...
Description: According to the IDF, one rocket fired from the Gaza Strip landed in the sea off the coast of central Israel.A second rocket failed to cross the border and fell short in Gaza, the IDF says.

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏è The last time Hamas fired rockets at Tel Aviv was in late May.
Description: Mannie's War Room: Hamas claims responsibility for the rocket fire The last time Hamas fired rockets at Tel Aviv was in late May.

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏èüñº Hamas claims responsibility for the rocket fire
Description: Mannie's War Room: Long-range rockets were launched from the Gaza Strip at central Israel a short while ago. The projectiles apparently hit the sea. No sirens sounded. Hamas claims responsibility for the rocket fire

Title: Long-range rockets were launched from the Gaza Strip at central I...
Description: Long-range rockets were launched from the Gaza Strip at central Israel a short while ago. The projectiles apparently hit the sea. No sirens sounded.

Title: üñº Lebanese media report an Israeli drone strike on a vehicle bet...
Description: Lebanese media report an Israeli drone strike on a vehicle between the southern Lebanon towns of Beit Yahoun and Baraachit.No further details are immediately available.

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏èüé¨ Footage shows a Hezbollah drone being shot down by the Iron ...
Description: Mannie's War Room: Two drones launched from Lebanon were shot down by air defenses a short while ago, according to the IDF. One of the drones was shot down over the Kiryat Shmona area, while the second was intercepted over Lebanon before crossing into Israel. Sirens had sounded‚Ä¶ Footage shows a Hezbollah drone being shot down by the Iron Dome air defense system over the Galilee Panhandle this morning.According to the IDF, a second drone heading toward Israel was shot down over Lebanese airspace.

Title: Two drones launched from Lebanon were shot down by air defenses a...
Description: Two drones launched from Lebanon were shot down by air defenses a short while ago, according to the IDF.One of the drones was shot down over the Kiryat Shmona area, while the second was intercepted over Lebanon before crossing into Israel.Sirens had sounded in Kiryat Shmona and nearby communities amid the incident.There are no reports of injuries.

Title: Five reserve soldiers suspected of the sexual abuse of a Palestin...
Description: Five reserve soldiers suspected of the sexual abuse of a Palestinian detainee at the Sde Teiman base in southern Israel are expected to be released to house arrest.Military prosecutors are seeking to extend their detention until next Thursday, for the investigation into the high-profile abuse case to continue.The defense says that it has come to an agreement with the prosecution to extend the suspects' remands, while releasing them to full house arrest.The agreement between the protection and defense will be presented to judges at a military court during a remand hearing later today.In all, ten soldiers at the Sde Teiman detention facility were detained over the suspected sexual abuse of a Hamas police officer, who had been arrested in the Gaza Strip. Prosecutors did not seek to hold five of them in custody, following new evidence in the case.According to the IDF, the soldiers were suspected of aggravated sodomy (a charge equivalent to rape), causing bodily harm under aggravated circumstances, abuse under aggravated circumstances and conduct unbecoming of a soldier.

Title: üé¨ Overnight, the IDF demolished the homes of Aysar Barghouti and...
Description: Overnight, the IDF demolished the homes of Aysar Barghouti and Khaled al-Kharouf, Palestinians accused of carrying out a deadly shooting attack in the West Bank in January, killing two people.The home of a third Palestinian detained over the attack, Murad Dahadhah, was demolished last month.In the attack on January 7 on Route 465, near the West Bank settlement of Ateret, the terrorists shot dead Amar Mansour, 33, a resident of the East Jerusalem neighborhood of Beit Hanina, and Lara Tannous, 42, a Palestinian woman from Ramallah who worked as a pharmacist at Jerusalem's Hadassah Medical Center.The three were arrested a day after the attack. Palestinian media report that troops demolished the homes of Barghouti and al-Kharouf in the Ramallah area overnight.Despite the victims being Palestinians, Israeli security authorities say the shooting was carried out with nationalist motives, meaning it is considered a terror attack.As a matter of policy, Israel demolishes the homes of Palestinians accused of carrying out deadly terror attacks.

Title: üé¨ A cell of terrorists that launched a rocket from Khan Younis a...
Description: A cell of terrorists that launched a rocket from Khan Younis at the Gaza border community of Ein Hashlosha yesterday was struck by a drone, the IDF says.According to the IDF, the airstrike was carried out shortly after the rocket attack, and additional strikes were carried out against sites used by terror groups in the area.The incident comes as the IDF's 98th Division continues a new offensive in Khan Younis. In the past day, the IDF says the troops demolished sites used by terror groups and killed several Hamas terror operatives, including others involved in rocket fire.Further south, in Rafah, troops with the 162nd Division located weapons and intelligence materials in the past day, the IDF says.Meanwhile, in the Netzarim Corridor in the Strip's center, the IDF says troops with the 252nd Reserve Division directed strikes on numerous Hamas sites, including rocket launchers, sniper positions, and observation posts. Video is too big

Title: üé¨ Last night, the IDF says fighter jets carried out airstrikes a...
Description: Last night, the IDF says fighter jets carried out airstrikes against buildings used by Hezbollah in southern Lebanon's Kafr Kila, Marwahin, and Mays al-Jabal.An observation post in Ayta ash-Shab was also struck, the IDF adds.

Description: Mannie's War Room: Daoud, a Hamas operative, had been jailed by Israel previously. He was released in November amid a hostage deal with Hamas, in which Israel released Palestinian terror convicts and detainees, mostly from the West Bank, in exchange for Israeli civilians abducted‚Ä¶ When the IDF understood that the gunman had fled Qalqilya, the commander of the IDF‚Äôs Ephraim Regional Brigade, Col. Netanel Shamaka, led his forces in pursuit of the terrorist.Amid an exchange of fire near the Palestinian town of Azzun, Shamaka shot the terrorist dead, a military source says.

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏è Daoud, a Hamas operative, had been jailed by Israel previously...
Description: Mannie's War Room: Photo Daoud, a Hamas operative, had been jailed by Israel previously.He was released in November amid a hostage deal with Hamas, in which Israel released Palestinian terror convicts and detainees, mostly from the West Bank, in exchange for Israeli civilians abducted by the terror group on October 7.
